description: For thousands of years witches of all form have walked the isles of Britain and been the topic of folklore and history. On this tour led by Vincent Edward Manda from Wonders of London we discover more about the witches of London.

designers.architect: Vincent Edward Manda - Wonders of London

factsheet.heading: Tour Information
paragraphs:
With the stories of bizarre practices and occurrences, anecdotes and a look at the unjust treatment of people thought to be witches from both witches and people who adored them or feared them, this two hour long historic guided tour is replete with a fascinating side of London’s history that is hardly ever mentioned.
Come and see London through different eyes with Wonders of London.

Please note/be aware that while this tour is not designed or meant to be offensive, it does have topics that may be viewed by some as such. These topics are approached from a historical perspective and are necessary for the subject matter of this tour. While their inclusion is not meant to offend, some attendees may find the subject matter troubling.
The topics include, but may not be limited to:

1. The historical involvement of the church and religion within context
2. The involvement of certain historical figures within context
3. Descriptions of different methods of torture (These descriptions are neither callous nor gratuitous)

factsheet.heading: Instructions
paragraphs: ■ APPOINTMENT: 15 minutes prior to the starting time

■ Look for the guide with our blue, red and white Wonders of London umbrella
(Please keep in mind that on the rare occasion that the guide is late it will probably be due to a delay on the public transport system. Please wait at the meeting point in the picture above and the guide will be with you as soon as possible)

■ If you are late and you miss the group, please head to the catch up location: next to the Tower of London gift shop, Three Quays Walk, Lower Thames St., EC3R 6AH
(Please take note that while each guide will make a stop at this location during the tour and while we will do everything possible to help you joining the group, in case you are too late or due to unforeseen circumstances such as road works or roads closures, we cannot guarantee that you will be able to find the group)
■ Important: no tube/bus ticket is needed for the tour

factsheet.heading: Tour Guide information
paragraphs: This tour is led by Vincent Edward Manda from Wonders of London. For more information info@wondersoflondon.com

location.address: outside the exit just by Trinity Square Gardens

name: Witches & Witchcraft History Tour
